discourse_list.title: MIP62c2 Amendment, Joint Statement - Comms Channels for Collateral Offboarding

content.content: Statement to Amend Pursuant to MIP62c3  Removal of a communication channel or media asset in MIP62c2 may be effected without the requirement for governance vote by a joint public statement on the MakerDAO Forum by any two Core Unit facilitators. Public statements should tag or otherwise directly notify @GovAlpha-Core-Unit.  c2 communication channel requirements are being amended to exclude public calendars. The new list is: GovComms (COM-001) publishes the associated notices to:  The Notices section of the MakerDAO Forum. The MakerDAO Official Discord’s Announcement channel. The official MakerDAO subreddit.  Signed, @Davidutro @Prose11 — cc: @mip-editors
content.GPT-summary: The post is a joint statement by two Core Unit facilitators proposing an amendment to MIP62c2, which concerns the removal of communication channels or media assets. The proposal suggests that such removal can be done without a governance vote, but through a joint public statement on the MakerDAO Forum by any two Core Unit facilitators. The post also mentions that the communication channel requirements are being amended to exclude public calendars.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
